Class MyPdfWriter

java.lang.Object
MyPdfWriter
public class MyPdfWriter extends Object
Writes to the document based on the instructions read in FileReader. Stores the current format values.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MyPdfWriter()
    Creates the document, and stores it in this class.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyPdfWriter

      public MyPdfWriter()
      Creates the document, and stores it in this class. Generates and stores Pdf font, that will be used for text.

  • Method Details

    • printCurrentFormat

      public void printCurrentFormat()
      Prints out the current formatting values (For Debugging Purposes).

    • addNewParagraph

      public void addNewParagraph(boolean writingFinished)
      Adds a new paragraph to the document with the current styling. These styles can be: .fill, .nofill, .indent .
      Parameters:
      writingFinished - If true close the document at the end, since it is the last paragraph (end of the loop). If false make a new paragraph (.paragraph was called).

    • addTextToParagraph

      public void addTextToParagraph(String text)
      Adds the styled text (based on the current format) to the current paragraph. This does not include paragraph related styling such as: .fill, .nofill, .indent . Only Text styling is added.
      Parameters:
      text - Set the text to this value.

    • setIsFilled

      public void setIsFilled(boolean isFill)
      Change fill (isFill) to the given value.
      Parameters:
      isFill - Set isFill -->.fill = true, .nofill = false.

    • setFontStyle

      public void setFontStyle(String fontStyle)
      Changes font style to the given value.
      Parameters:
      fontStyle - Set regular, italic, bold font style.

    • setFontSize

      public void setFontSize(String fontSize)
      Changes the font size to the given size.
      Parameters:
      fontSize - Set small, normal, large.

    • changeIndentBy

      public void changeIndentBy(int amount)
      Changes Indent by the given value (can be positive or negative).
      Parameters:
      amount - Change indent by this value.
